Title: Relates to authorizing the village of Nyack to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands
Summary: Authorizes the village of Nyack to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands and to use the funds received for the acquisition of new parklands and/or capital improvements to existing park and recreational facilities.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the village of Nyack to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands
